s2.title: Unpacking the files
s2.p: &packagename; is packaged as a ZIP file for all platforms and operating systems. You can run the Java jar command to unpack the distribution.

ul.li: This command creates a "&packagedirectory;" sub-directory in the current directory containing all the files.

s2.title: Files in the binary package release

tr.td: Jar file containing all the parser class files
Jar file containing all sample class files
Directory containing sample XML data files
Directory containing Javadoc API for parser framework

s2.note: To use &packagename; you do not need the source files.
